message: Let's be fair, Bob. This offer leaves us both with a good amount.
I understand you want to be fair Alice, but this money is more valuable to me right now.  Let's make a deal!
The clock is ticking, Bob. This is a reasonable offer considering the circumstances.
Alice, time is running out. This is a fair deal, let's split it evenly and not risk ending up with nothing!
Bob, my offer is still generous. Don't let greed get the best of both of us.
Alice, I'm trying to be reasonable, but I need you to meet me halfway here. This is my final offer!
